member.name: MIB_TCP6TABLE2
member.summary: TheMIB_TCP6TABLE2 structure contains a table of IPv6 TCP connections on the local computer.

member.name: MIB_TCP6TABLE2.dwNumEntries
member.summary: A value that specifies the number of TCP connections in the array.

member.name: MIB_TCP6TABLE2.table
member.summary: An array of structures containing TCP connection entries.
